product_name: Girnar Instant Premix With Masala (36 Sachets): Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: It's the best instant tea mix ever ! Ready in no time just add hot water and that's it... The best taste of masala tea to get refreshed instantly. Try it and you'll definitely fall in love with it... You can use 3 sachates for 200ml if you want little thick tea and stronger taste.

reviews.review_title: Best alternative to the Natural chai
reviews.review_body: I am not sure how healthy is it in terms of alternative to the real chai. But all I can say is Its like the Maggi of Chais. Do I need to say more?I have been consuming it for the last 3 months now. Plz ping me if there are any side effects of consuming instant tea on regular basis.Thanks

reviews.review_title: In love even though not a tea person
reviews.review_body: First learnt about this product on indigo airline. They serve Girnar Masala Tea .. Was in instant love for this product . Landed googled ordered .. Thats it ...Have ordered their multi flavour instant pack as well .. Want to try all their flavours .. Since its instant good for guys putting up at hostel / no kitchen arrangement .. All you need is hot water and stir .. Enjoy ..

reviews.review_title: Product is great! A request to tea-amo vendor
reviews.review_body: Product is great! A request to tea-amo vendor... If I order 2 packets of tea, I am charged Rs 80 for each packet! Please normalise your delivery charges which are currently 50 percent of the product charges!

reviews.review_title: Great taste, just need hot water
reviews.review_body: Good product. Used it a lot during travel to UK- just add hot water and tea is ready. Ordered again once previous stock got over. Very convenient. Have seen this being used in a few hostels as well. Saw it first time in Mumbai's capsule hotel in Sakinaka.Would have been great if the per packet cost is a bit cheaper under 10 rupees.

First tasted it on an Indigo flight, than at a hotel in Mumbai. Made up my mind to get my hands on it and finally found it here on Amazon. Been a regular buyer of this product since. A fantastic product that allows you to make a perfect cup of your favorite masala tea in minutes. All you need is a hot cup of water.

Have first tried this product during indigo flight. The taste was good, bought this online.....but after couple of drinks have lost charm.....now its kept ideal and have moved to normal adrak wale chai...nothing relaces that and espicially have tried new TAJMAHAL range if masal chai its awesome.......price wise its bit costly but taste is awesome

reviews.review_title: Shouldnâ€™t be recommended only in case of emergency or when u donâ€™t have enough time to make tea a
reviews.review_body: Itâ€™s good for travelers....not for home use or daily use. Itâ€™s too pungent in smell and u will not feel good to consume more. These instant mix should only in case of an emergency. For office purposes also u can use it. Also one more thing itâ€™s sugary too. It has a good flavour no doubt but itâ€™s not that what I expected. So I donâ€™t use it frequently now.

Da sucht man lange nach einem Tee, den man gerne und im wieder in Indien getrunken hat. Man probiert die ganzen Teebeutel, auf denen Chai steht, aus. Die haben Ã¼berhaupt nichts gemeinsames mit dem Masala Tee in Indien. Und dann finde ich endlich diesen nach langem Suchen. Kann einen sÃ¼chtig machen :-).
nur eins: LECKER. Ich lache immer nur, wenn die Ware nicht in der voraussichtlichen angegebenen Lieferzeit kommt, sondern meist zwei bis drei Tage eher!
Sehr hatte es auch in Indien eingekauft und getrunken
Love this tea..its a bit higher priced than other varieties but wonderful to drink

reviews.review_title: Instant mix tastes like the real thing (westerner's opinion)
reviews.review_body: I'm an american who has greatly enjoyed masala chai on my trips to India.  It and filter coffee are two of the things I crave and miss in the States.  To my western-trained, eastern-loving tastebuds, this instant product tasted like the real thing.  Thanks!
